title: Pandemic stops fertility treatments in Atlantic region
description: Atlantic Assisted Reproductive Therapies in Halifax and Conceptia in Moncton, N.B., say they have no idea how long it will be before they're back up and running, but they want to reassure patients in the meantime.
content: Atlantic Canada s two fertility clinics have stopped all in person treatments because of the COVID pandemic Atlantic Assisted Reproductive Therapies in Halifax and Conceptia in Moncton N B say they have no idea how long it will be before they re back chars
